text: The Belgium women's national under-16 and under-17 basketball team is a national basketball team of Belgium, administered by the Belgien Basketball Federation.Profile | Belgium, FIBA.com, Retrieved 19 July 2016. It represents the country in international under-16 and under-17 (under age 16 and under age 17) women's basketball competitions. ==Competitive record== {|class="wikitable" |- |2010 FIBA Under-17 World Championship for Women||4th place |- |2012 FIBA Under-17 World Championship for Women||7th place |} {|class="wikitable" |- |1976 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||13th place |- |1978 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||10th place |- |1984 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||10th place |- |1985 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||10th place |- |1993 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||8th place |- |1995 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||bgcolor=peru|3rd place |- |1997 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||10th place |- |2004 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||13th place |- |2005 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||14th place |- |2006 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||13th place |- |2007 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||12th place |- |2008 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||5th place |- |2009 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||bgcolor=silver|Runners-up |- |2010 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||8th place |- |2011 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||bgcolor=silver|Runners-up |- |2012 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||4th place |- |2013 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||13th place |- |2014 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||7th place |- |2015 FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship for Women||14th place (relegated) |} ==See also== *Belgium women's national basketball team *Belgium women's national under-19 basketball team *Belgium men's national under-17 basketball team ==References== ==External links== *Archived records of Belgium team participations Category:Basketball in Belgium Category:Basketball teams in Belgium Category:Women's national under-17 basketball teams Basketball
title: Belgium women's national under-17 basketball team
